    • modifyPartInHouseRadioButtonClicked

      public void modifyPartInHouseRadioButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method controls the in-house radio button. The method sets the label of the modify part form to "Machine ID".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify part in house button clicked.

    • modifyPartOutsourcedRadioButtonClicked

      public void modifyPartOutsourcedRadioButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the outsourced radio button. The method sets the label of the modify part form to "Company Name".
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - modify part outsourced radio button clicked.

    • modifyPartSaveButtonClicked

      public void modifyPartSaveButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the save button and saves the modified part. The method checks to ensure accuracy of the fields being entered. The method shows an error message if there are empty fields or invalid values entered. It will display a success message if the product is modified successfully,then takes the user back to the main form. RUNTIME ERROR: When the product was modified and added to the inventory shown on the main screen, the old version of the product was not replaced. I forgot remove the old version of the product and then add in the new modified version. Thus, I deleted the old one by using Inventory.deletePart() and use addPart() to add the new version to the inventory.

    • modifyPartCancelButtonClicked

      public void modifyPartCancelButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      this method shows a confirmation message when the cancel button is clicked. if the user selects OK, they're redirected to the main form window. if the user clicks the cancel button, then they'll stay on the current page.
      Parameters:
      event - modify part cancel button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException
